16-47890 |blank1_name = |blank1_info = |website = |footnotes = }} Lost River is a city in Custer County, Idaho, United States. It had 42 residents at the 2020 census. ==Geography== Lost River is located at (43.721785, -113.544931). According to the United States Census Bureau, the city has a total area of . of it is land and is water. It is named after the Big Lost River. ==References== Category:Cities in Idaho Category:Custer County, Idaho
